description.value:
Fits over power armour, has a hooked magnetic clip that can be anchored to a variety of surfaces and then unspooled to aid in climbing or absailing. Grants +30 to Climb Tests, and character doesn't fall if they fail such tests.

Effect: Initiated

Notes: 4 R
